column4: not sure if you got an answer, but you should not use update-manager -d when there is an official release. Use update manager as usual, just change release from lts to normal under settings.
ah, cool, thanks.  That fixes it.  -d finds the rc, but turning off LTS only finds the maverick release.
yes, the -d switch is so you can install pre-releases.
I figured it would still find newer release, that's fixed.  Thanks.
